title: Escape from Zombies
description: Escape From Zombies is a thrilling zombie action game where your mission is to save as many people as possible. Navigate through exciting levels, armed with a variety of weapons and simple controls. In this transformed world, overrun by zombies, it's up to you to guide survivors to the airfield for their safety. Exercise caution with missiles and exploding barrels to prevent harm to the people you're rescuing. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!
